title: Full Stack Developer
description: Develop end-to-end web applications using modern technologies.
requirements: Proficiency in frontend and backend technologies such as React.js and Node.js
Experience with databases like MongoDB or MySQL
Ability to work with RESTful APIs and cloud services

title: Flutter Developer
description: Create engaging and high-performance mobile applications for iOS and Android.
requirements: Experience with Flutter or React Native
Knowledge of mobile UI/UX best practices
Familiarity with API integration and Firebase

title: AI Prompt Engineer
description: Design and optimize prompts for AI-driven applications to enhance user interactions.
requirements: Strong understanding of AI models like GPT and LLMs
Ability to fine-tune and experiment with AI-generated responses
